ActionParameters.Name: SqlQuery
ActionParameters.Value:
UPDATE       app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail
SET                Amount = app.ortomo_Preparaat.PrijsPerPack, RowAmount = app.ortomo_Preparaat.PrijsPerPack * app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.Quantity
FROM            app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail INNER JOIN
                         app.ortomo_ShoppingCart ON app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.ShoppingCart = app.ortomo_ShoppingCart.Id INNER JOIN
                         app.ortomo_Preparaat ON app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.Id = app.ortomo_Preparaat.Id
WHERE app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.ShoppingCart=@ShoppingCart;

UPDATE       app.ortomo_ShoppingCart
SET                TotalAmount = Q1.TotaalBedrag, Quantity = Q1.TotaalQuantity
FROM            (SELECT        app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.ShoppingCart, SUM(app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.RowAmount) AS TotaalBedrag, SUM(app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.Quantity) AS TotaalQuantity
                          FROM            app.ortomo_ShoppingCart AS ortomo_ShoppingCart_1 INNER JOIN
                                                    app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail ON ortomo_ShoppingCart_1.Id = app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.ShoppingCart
                          GROUP BY app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.ShoppingCart) AS Q1 INNER JOIN
                         app.ortomo_ShoppingCart ON Q1.ShoppingCart = app.ortomo_ShoppingCart.Id
HAVING app.ortomo_ShoppingCartDetail.ShoppingCart=@ShoppingCart
